question: I am NOT a ftm but it has been 4 years since my last glucose test. I passed it last time but I made me feel just horrid. So this time I am still willing to take the FIRST 1 hour test but if I fail it I am wanting to Refuse the 3 hour glucose test and just have my doctors treat me as though I have Gestational Diabetes. Anyone else refuse ANY tests?
title: glucose test
